name: Pet Shop Clicker
description:
Pet shop manager clicker.

See for how long can you survive it, without going bankrupt. Sell and breed cats, dogs, birds and fishes. But beware, cat population is increasing on random and number of fishes is shrinking. What could have caused it?

The project was created in 5 days period during Unity education at PISMO Novska

Programmer : Mirna Tominac

Mentor: Dominik Cvetkovski

Update: 1.0
